css
.demo{
  display: grid;
  grid-template-rows: 0fr;
  overflow: hidden;
  transition:all .5s;
  background-color: skyblue;
}
.content {
  min-height: 0;
}
button:hover+.demo{
  grid-template-rows: 1fr;
}
